alerts.description: Internal Change Request Ready to be Processed
Notify Contract Ops Software of Contract Creation
Notify Contract owner of the request - Excep
Notify Contract owner of the request - Std
Processing Pause is ready for processing
Processing Pause is ready to send
send email to finance about Amendment

fieldUpdates.name: Set Contract Approval Status to Approved
Set Contract Approval Status to Pending
Set Contract Approval Status to Rejected

fieldUpdates.description: When a contract is approved, set the contract stage to "Quote approved to send to customer"
fieldUpdates.literalValue: Quote approved to send to customer
fieldUpdates.name: Set Status to approved to send

fieldUpdates.literalValue: Waiting for Specialist approval to send
fieldUpdates.name: Update Contract Status

rules.description: Email notification for when a contract is Approval Status is set to Approved
Rule Code: CTR-001Exxx Recognize Revenue Sends an email notification to Finance whenever Contract shipping status changes to "Fulfilled", to recognize revenue on this deal.
Rule Code: CTR-002xxxT Bridgeway Closing Creates and assign a task to the SE's and Accounting with instructions for proceeding, When a Bridgeway deal closes
Rule Code: CTR-003xxxT Bridgeway Invoice Creates and assign a task to accounting When the shipping is completed
Rule Code: CTR-004Exxx Quote Ready to Send Sends an email notification to the Sales Manager that the quote is ready to send, when the quote has been approved by the Sales and SE Directors.
Rule Code: CTR-005Exxx Contract Created Notification Sends an email notification to sales op's that a contract has been created.
Rule Code: CTR-006Txxx Send Invoice (Services Only) When contract status changes to "Contract Executied" and type is "Services Only"
Rule Code: CTR-007Exxx Software Delivery Notification To let Sales Admin know that a contract has been signed so software delivery can be arranged.
Rule Code: CTR-008Exxx Send Invoice (Software Only) When contract status changes to "Contract Executied" and type is "Software Only"
Rule Code: CTR-009.1Exxx Send Invoice Sends an email notification when contract status changes to "In Force"
Rule Code: CTR-009Exxx Send Invoice Sends an email notification when contract status changes to "In Force"

Rule Code: CTR-010EFxx Contract - Send Notification Sends an email notification when "Send External Notification" field is checked and the "External Notification Sent" is blank. Also updates the "External Notification Sent" with the current date.
Rule Code: CTR-011Exxx Notify CRM when Billing Pause is being processed Sends an email notification whenever the Billing Pause Status is "Processing Pause"
Rule Code: CTR-012Exxx Notify CRM when Billing Pause is signed Sends an email notification whenever the Billing Pause Status is set to "Received Signature"
Rule Code: CTR-013xFxx Populate Vera's Email Address Populates Vera's email address so that she can be copied on the emails that the contacts receive.
Rule Code: CTR-014Exxx Tariq's Email Notification Sends an email notification to Tariq whenever Don is the approver on a record
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Approval_Status__c), Approval_Status__c="Pending", OR( Approver_1__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Approver_2__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Approver_3__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Approver_4__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Approver_5__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Exception_Approver_1__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Exception_Approver_2__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Exception_Approver_3__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Exception_Approver_4__r.Id="00530000000byF9", Exception_Approver_5__r.Id="00530000000byF9" ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: CTR-015Exxx Stephen's Email Notification Sends an email notification to Jason whenever Stephen is the approver on a record
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Approval_Status__c), Approval_Status__c="Pending", OR( Approver_1__r.LastName="Robertson", Approver_2__r.LastName="Robertson", Approver_3__r.LastName="Robertson", Approver_4__r.LastName="Robertson", Approver_5__r.LastName="Robertson", Approver_6__r.LastName="Robertson", Exception_Approver_1__r.LastName="Robertson", Exception_Approver_2__r.LastName="Robertson", Exception_Approver_3__r.LastName="Robertson", Exception_Approver_4__r.LastName="Robertson", Exception_Approver_5__r.LastName="Robertson", Exception_Approver_6__r.LastName="Robertson" ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: CTR-016Exxx Send Invoice - Rekoop Sends an email notification when contract status changes to "Contract Executed"
Rule Code: CTR-017xxxx Shipping Notification After shipping data has been entered by Sales Ops, a notification is sent to Support to ship.
Rule Code: CTR-018xxxx Contract Signed Notification To let our SE Team know that a contract has been signed.
Rule Code: CTR-019Exxx Shipping Info Request To notify Sales Ops to complete shipping wizard on finalized contract.
Rule Code: CTR-020ExxT Customer Entitled to Permanent License - Payment Received When a customer pays IntApp, they can then receive their permanent license from the SE team.
Rule Code: CTR-021Exxx Bridgeway Activate Contract When accounting changes payment status to "received", the sales specialist receives an e-mail informing him/her to "activate" the contract.
Rule Code: CTR-022Exxx Reference Program Notification Sends an email notification when Reference Program checkbox is checked on Contract record along with Contract closure.
Rule Code: CTR-023Exxx Billing Pause - Processing pause
Rule Code: CTR-024Exxx Billing Pause - Received Signature
Rule Code: CTR-025Exxx Contract Created Notification with Opportunity fulfilling entity = Intapp Sends an email notification to sales op's that a contract has been created.
Rule Code: CTR-026Exxx Contract Updated with Opportunity where Fulfilling Entity = Intapp Notification Sends an email notification to sales op's that a contract has been created.
Rule Code: CTR-028Exxx Amendment - Ready to Send when status is Processing Amendment
Rule Code: CTR-044Exxx Deactivate Trial notification
Contract: Non-Standard Cloud Location - this dealNOT EQUAL TOnull

tasks.description: Payment received. 1. Verify all documents have been received, are attached in SalesForce, and activate contract. 2. Ensure opp amount matches invoice amount 3. Ensure acct type is customer 4. Ensure all other acct contracts are void
tasks.subject: Activate Contract

tasks.description: Contract is ready, configure and send the appliance, then update SF with the shipping data. When you switch the contract to "Shipping data entered..." a task will automatically be sent to accounting to send an invoice when the appliance is received.
tasks.subject: Appliance ready to ship

tasks.description: Contract is ready, configure and send the appliance, then update SF with the shipping data. When you switch the contract to "Shipping data entered..." a task will automatically be sent to accounting to send an invoice when the appliance is received.
tasks.subject: Appliance ready to ship.

tasks.description: Contract is ready, configure and send the appliance, then update SF with the shipping data.
tasks.subject: Eval appliance ready to ship

tasks.description: Payment has been received, this customer is now entitled to receive a permanent license. Thanks and have a great day!
tasks.subject: Payment received, send license

tasks.description: Email Tony Navarro for customer Project Lead info, shipping info, a blank Config. doc. After Config. Doc is received (or 30 days), send appliance, notify Tony w/ shipping data, and update SF.com shipping data. Switch contract to "shipping data entered..."
tasks.subject: Prepare Bridgeway Appliance

tasks.description: A services-only contract has been executed, please invoice.
tasks.subject: Prepare an Invoice (Services Only Contract)

tasks.description: A contract has been executed, please prepare an invoice.
tasks.subject: Prepare an Invoice
